invocations.description: Resizes all windows that fit the description of locationname to the specified size (can be 0/omitted to be as small as possible, or some big value to be as big as possible). If locationname is not specified, all windows are resized. If onlyone is specified as true, then only one matching window is resized.
invocations.exDescription: Opens your 'back' item and resize it to the smallest possible size.
